StreamingExchangeService
public abstract class BaseWebSocketExchangeService
extends BaseExchangeService
implements StreamingExchangeService

Streaming market data service to provide the following to streaming market data API:

  • Connection to an upstream market data source with a configured provider

getWebSocketStatus

public org.java_websocket.WebSocket.READYSTATE getWebSocketStatus()
Description copied from interface: StreamingExchangeService
Returns current state of websocket connection. Will return one of these values: NOT_YET_CONNECTED, CONNECTING, OPEN, CLOSING, CLOSED
